Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's has struggled to keep Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's front-runner status on tBen Carson Democratic side of tBen Carson 2016 presidential race, as a new poll shows Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's is staying afloat despite growing unfavorability numbers The erosion of Clinton's lead over Sanders , Carson is perhaps the poll's most dramatic news, as the former first lady and secretary of state has tumbled from 64 percent in July 2014 to 44 percent now. Clinton's campaign has been overwhelmed by controversy after it was revealed this spring that Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's used a private, home-based email server while Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's was secretary of state. The FBI is investigating whether Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's mishandled any classified information. Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's has denied any wrongdoing and has not been formally accused of any crime. Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's has also apologized multiple times in national interviews and is expected to testify in late October before a House committee. Yet none of Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's efforts at atonement seem to be stopping Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's stumbling in national Fox News polls. Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's favorability ratings are at a new low after three years of Fox News polls, for example, as only 38 percent of respondents in a new poll view Jeb Bush Hillary Clinton's favorably, down from a high of 56 percent in June 2013. None of the other major candidates had as dramatic of a downward change in the other major candidates favorability numbers.
